decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2154 (U34W) 01 P1, 2154 (U34W) 02 P1, 2154 (U34W) 03 P1, 2154 (U3MW) 03 P1, Planning statement and flood risk assessment. Received 18th January 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Before the additional floorspace hereby approved is brought into use, full details (including manufacturers' specifications) of additional secure, covered cycle parking facilities (for not less than 3 cycles) for staff have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved facilities shall conform to current guidance such as the TfL London Cycling Design Standards and the West London Cycle Parking Guidance in design and layout and be fully implemented and be made available for use before the first occupation of the development and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.

Condition : 4 - A Work Place Travel Plan shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the use of the mezzanine floors hereby permitted commencing. The measures approved in the Travel Plan shall be implemented prior to the use of the mezzanine floors hereby permitted commencing and shall be so maintained for the duration of the use, unless the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority is obtained to any variation

Condition : 5 - Prior to the commencement of development on site, a Service Delivery Plan shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The operation of the warehouse unit shall not be carried out other than in accordance with the approved details.
description: Construction of mezzanine floors to Unit 3 (378sqm) and Unit 4 (292sqm) plus a new escape staircase to Unit 4
